description: ioThings is a Dutch company and was established in 2016 by three technology enthusiasts with a professional background in electronics, security, IT and telecom. Due to the unique skills of our employees, we are able to facilitate complete product development in-house. We adopt the latest and greatest techniques to develop user friendly, innovative and high-quality Internet of Things products, which solve real-world issues. We love to work pragmatically and interact with you to find the best solution for your challenge. Feel free to contact our excellent support department.
